name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「輪廻転生」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Reincarnation＂【#天音かなた4周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [APoXxcv37GU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Haikei Doppelganger' (拝啓ドッペルゲンガー) alongside a shadow-like figure representing her alter ego.
scenes.song_name: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー

scenes.description: A transition sequence with visual glitches and static, shifting to a new setting and costume.
Amane Kanata performs 'Kokoro' (ココロ) in a futuristic laboratory-like setting, wearing a robot-inspired outfit.

subtitles.original: いつかは一人だけ
subtitles.english: One day, only one person

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger

subtitles.original: そりゃそうさ君は僕だろう
subtitles.english: Of course, you are me, right?

subtitles.original: 奪い取った一語一文を
subtitles.english: Every word and sentence I've stolen

subtitles.original: 掻き果てる前に
subtitles.english: Before it's all used up

subtitles.original: 誰でもいい何でもいい
subtitles.english: Anyone is fine, anything is fine

subtitles.original: 器をください
subtitles.english: Please give me a vessel

subtitles.original: 狂った正解を染め上げて
subtitles.english: Dyeing the insane correct answer

subtitles.original: ルンパッパ
subtitles.english: Rum-pa-pa

subtitles.original: それはずっと続く人の業の連鎖
subtitles.english: It's an eternal chain of human karma

subtitles.original: PAIN
subtitles.english: PAIN

subtitles.original: 委ね合って許し合って満たされていく
subtitles.english: Entrusting, forgiving, and being filled

subtitles.original: 欠けたピース無価値のペイン裏腹な愛も
subtitles.english: Missing pieces, worthless pain, and contradictory love

subtitles.original: 愛し合って生まれ変わるイニシエーション
subtitles.english: Loving each other and being reborn: Initiation

subtitles.original: 僕のほうがちゃんと君を生きてやるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll live your life properly

subtitles.original: 君も次の誰かちゃんと救わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: So you must save the next person properly

subtitles.original: 分かったんだ何をすればいいかさあ
subtitles.english: I've realized what I need to do now

subtitles.original: どうか誰か僕に奇跡をくれ
subtitles.english: Please, someone, give me a miracle

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　君は君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you?

subtitles.original: アイコンタクト交差して僕は誰？
subtitles.english: Eye contact crosses, who am I?

subtitles.original: 止まらない戻れない
subtitles.english: Can't stop, can't go back

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは君の―
subtitles.english: Hello there, I am your—

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　それはそれは僕
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, that's me

subtitles.original: 虫が這い出すように世界が気付こうが
subtitles.english: As if insects were crawling out, even if the world notices

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まない冷め止まない
subtitles.english: It won't stop ringing, it won't stop cooling

subtitles.original: 奇跡のリアリティが狂った正解を
subtitles.english: The reality of miracles, the insane correct answer

subtitles.original: 染め上げるさ
subtitles.english: Will dye it all

subtitles.original: 上手くやれよルンパッパ
subtitles.english: Do it well, rum-pa-pa

subtitles.original: 「どうもこんにちは君の分身です。」
subtitles.english: “Hello there, I am your alter ego.”

subtitles.original:
ココロ
作詞・作曲：トラボルタ
subtitles.english:
Kokoro
Lyrics & Composition: Torabolta

subtitles.original: 孤独な科学者に作られたロボット
subtitles.english: A robot created by a lonely scientist

subtitles.original: 出来栄えを言うなら「奇跡」
subtitles.english: If you were to describe its workmanship, it's a “miracle”

subtitles.original: だけどまだ足りない　一つだけ出来ない
subtitles.english: But it's still missing something, there's just one thing it can't do

subtitles.original: それは「心」というプログラム
subtitles.english: That is the program called “Heart”

subtitles.original: 幾百年が過ぎ　独りで残された
subtitles.english: Hundreds of years passed, left all alone

subtitles.original: 奇跡のロボットは願う
subtitles.english: The miracle robot makes a wish

subtitles.original: 知りたい　あの人が命の終わりまで
subtitles.english: I want to know, until the end of that person's life

subtitles.original: 私に作ってた「ココロ」
subtitles.english: The “heart” they were making for me

subtitles.original: 今　動き始めた加速する奇跡
subtitles.english: Now, the accelerating miracle has begun to move

subtitles.original: なぜかナミダが止まらない…
subtitles.english: For some reason, the tears won't stop...

subtitles.original: なぜ私震える？加速する鼓動
subtitles.english: Why am I trembling? The accelerating heartbeat

subtitles.original: これが私の望んだ「ココロ」？
subtitles.english: Is this the “heart” that I wanted?

subtitles.original: フシギ　ココロ　ココロ　フシギ
subtitles.english: Strange, heart, heart, strange

subtitles.original: 私は知った　喜ぶ事を
subtitles.english: I have learned what it means to be happy

subtitles.original: フシギ　ココロ　ココロ　フシギ
subtitles.english: Strange, heart, heart, strange

subtitles.original: 私は知った　悲しむ事を
subtitles.english: I have learned what it means to be sad

subtitles.original: フシギ　ココロ　ココロ　無限…
subtitles.english: Strange, heart, heart, infinite...
